thread.title: Re: Smoke alarm randomly going off
thread.title_full: Re: Smoke alarm randomly going off

author: Kamarantes Community Member
title: Re: Smoke alarm randomly going off
text:
2 weeks ago
We have 3 of these throughout our house and one of them (the same one)… randomly goes off, stating fire in the house. It’s not near steam, it’s been cleaned… it just randomly does it. How do I determine if it’s just a faulty product?
thank you.
a week ago
Hi Kamarantes,
Thank you for posting in the community! I’m sorry to hear that your Nest Protect randomly goes off. No worries. I'd be happy to help.
To better assist you, I’d like to ask the following questions:
To further assist in diagnosing the situation, I can suggest a safety checkup on your Nest Protect. You can find detailed instructions by checking this article: Learn about Safety Checkup.
After completing the safety checkup, please let me know the following:
Any additional details you can provide will be helpful.
Best regards,
Daniel
yesterday
Daniel-I would also appreciate help with this. We have 2 randomly going off and need replacing.
4 hours ago
Hey DCMath,
Thank you so much for sharing your concerns with me. I understand that you’re facing the same situation with your smoke alarms randomly going off. Let me assist you with further information; it’s a pleasure.
I appreciate that you have taken action by performing the troubleshooting steps above. I can suggest another step, so try to do a factory reset. For your reference, follow this article: Reset Nest Protect and erase all settings. Then if the situation persists, the team would like to learn more about this behavior. When you get a chance, please fill out this form and let us know when you’re finished. We’ll have someone reach out to you via email from there.
Best regards,
Daniel
45m ago
Daniel - I have filled out the form after doing the factory reset. And we are still having the same issues,
yesterday
I have the same issue and have previously written about this in another thread that was closed. Can you help me with this too? Except we have 2 nest protects randomly going off after being thoroughly cleaned and batteries replaced.
